name: Sliders (itch)
description:
Sliders is a 2D platformer based on physics elements. Balance yourself over platforms or interact with your environment by shooting- find a way to reach the end of a level as fast as possible.

You can jump up walls, make Fire Barrels explode and use them as boosts, and much more. But be careful, if you stand too close to the explosion, it will hit and damage you. Also, you can shoot at some platforms to manipulate their gravity. Destroy turrets that attack you and cleverly dodge Tesla Coils that attract you. 

Build your own levels, publish them and play the levels of others. Compare yourself with your friends to see who can finish a level faster. While you play you get so called "Blocks" with which you can unlock new skins and trails.

Our plans: We plan to add more objects and improve the graphics- You can help us realize these plans by sending us improvement suggestions and ideas!
